name: Werewolf: Human or monster?
description:
You are mayor of Wolven town.

Be careful, it's up to you to make the tough decisions which will lead the town to thrive or ruin.

Beware! No one should find out about your Wolf curse!

Do you have what it takes to help the city prosper?

Will you hang on to your humanity or succumb to the monster within.

The cards are in your hands

  • Try to solve the curse you suffers before the full moon arrive!
  • System of stats based on your decision
  • System of night and day which influence the character you will meet!
  • System of locations!
  • Multiples ending!
  • And mores!

DISCLAIMER : This game was made for the Darktober Jam and is incomplet and still in the early prototype phase! Nothing was balanced due to lacks of times. Gameplay is still under development.

UI and actual content may be subject to change!

The actual game is 'playable' but no ending would be reacheable and no stats currently update.

How to play : swip by right and left!

All thanks from the Cartographer teams!

Credits : 

Nio Kasgami (Lead artist, Lead)

Quixios (Lead programmer)

Akusan & StarNavigator (Writers)
